title: SVOM/MXT localisation parameters
description: MXT refined localisation after a slew of the SVOM platform on an ECLAIRs triggered source

flux_error.description: Error on the mean flux of the detection [erg.cm^-2]

use_VT_attitude.description: Whether the platform stabilisation process uses the VT instead of the standard star tracker. This leads to an improved localization.
